text:
CGI-NL | NETHERLANDS | FULL-TIME

CGI Netherlands is looking for full-time Engineers with experience in JAVA, Data Science, Software, Security, Infrastructure and BI.

We are growing fast and want to hire a great number of people this year. Therefore the specifics of the job openings are too various to mention here, but contact me on ahmet.taspinar@cgi.com for more information.

Work-life balance is good and it's a great place to work. Chosen as Top Employer 2016 Netherlands and won Computable Awards 2015.

contact: ahmet.taspinar@cgi.com
